lbl.ColorDetailsDescription: Clicking on a color in the grid opens a dialog that displays detailed information about the selected color, including alternative names and color types.
lbl.ColorGridDescription: The colors found are displayed in a grid. Each color can be clicked on to display further details.
lbl.ColorSearchDescription: Users can use a color input to search for specific colors. The search results are displayed in a grid.
lbl.Description: I have created an overview of Duncan Rhodes' Two Thin Coats colors on this page.
lbl.FunctionsDescription: This page offers the following functions
